name: pixel plush perfect: alpha
description:
Pixel Plush Perfect is a tamagotchi-like made with RPG Maker 2003. 

Your Plushware has an appetite! It gets sick! It grows bored! All the fun aspects of being alive. Tend to its needs to gain plushtokens and buy chiptunes, furniture, and evolution devices for your Plushware!

4 types of Plusware to choose from.

*Note - this is a very rough alpha build!!

All songs by Yume Crush (that's me!) made with a Game Boy and LSDJ except for the title song which was made in a DAW.
